text: Ermine Power Station is a natural gas-fired station owned by SaskPower, under construction about 10 km southeast of Kerrobert, Saskatchewan, Canada and operated as a peaking plant. The project underwent environmental assessment in 2008. ==Description== The Ermine Power Station consists of: * 2 x 46 MW units ==References== ==External links== Category:Natural gas-fired power stations in Saskatchewan Category:SaskPower
title: Ermine Power Station
